page.title: 10MY SCHOOL
page.content: 75 children attend this school from 5 to 9 yrs old. I leave this September. Mrs. Hayward teaches my class. Mrs. Scott teaches class one and Mrs. Dredge has class two. Mr. Nolan is the Headmaster. He takes everone for reading and other lessons. Mrs. Shearman is the Secretary. We have a swimming pool. In summer we use it every day. Girls play netball with our dinner lady and the boys play football. We like our play boat, sand pit and play bars. We enjoy country dancing and our May pole. Our class uses Fletcher, Lomond and Hesse maths books. Mrs. Brooker our caretaker keeps the school very clean. Two dinner ladies serve us and Mrs. Overy helps the children. We have just bought a second computer. We watch some television programmes.
